job.title: QA Software Engineer/SDET (Rochester)
job.description:
Dematic is an intralogistics innovator that designs, builds and supports intelligent, automated solutions for manufacturing, warehouse and distribution environments for customers that are powering the future of commerce. With engineering centers, manufacturing facilities and service centers located in more than 25 countries, the Dematic global network of 10,000 employees has helped achieve more than 6,000 worldwide customer installations for some of the world’s leading brands. Headquartered in Atlanta, Dematic is a member of KION Group, one of the global leaders in industrial trucks and supply chain solutions, and a leading provider of warehouse automation.
The Role
Capabilities
Demonstrate an understanding of industry-standard software Quality Assurance methodologies, tools and processes
Possess knowledge of Warehouse Controls, Warehouse Management, or Warehouse Execution Software and operational processes
Experience with Object Oriented Programming languages (C# or Java) and SOLID design principles
Experience with Git or other distributed version control systems
Exposure to Continuous Integration / Continuous Deployment practices
Experience on working with various Operating Systems
Familiar with Agile methodology.
Setting up production-like environment in local environment and also be able to deploy artifacts
Design and develop test suites with Java, Selenium, TestNG framwork
Experience in testing web services such as REST and SOAP.
Familiarity with build tools such as Ant, Maven
Experience in using test management tools like Testrail
Experience in any bug tracking or issue tracking tool like JIRA
Understand database structure and how to retrieve information using MYSQL or SQLServer
Understand Customer business requirements to foresee potential issues, provide input on functional requirements and advise on design
Define and execute test scripts, evaluate results against predicted outcomes
Have the ability to effectively communicate risks for mitigation and defects for swift resolution
Participate in, and eventually lead onsite testing of software with related distribution center functional groups and mechatronics
Participate in, and lead Customer end-user training as related to the standard operating of the software tested
Support Dematic’s Customer Service center with trouble-shooting root cause to expedite resolution
Be willing to take ownership of testing excellence for optimal project execution
tion
Experience And Education
What We Are Looking For
The ideal SDET will have the following education, certifications and experience:
Masters Degree or similar degree
Software Quality Assurance Certifications - Preferred
3 – 5 years QA testing experience - Preferred
2 – 5 years distribution center, material handling, or software industry experience - Preferred
